#D bulk
```{bash}
#!/bin/bash
#SBATCH -t 100:00:00
#SBATCH -c 1
#SBATCH --mem 30G
#SBATCH -J scite

input="/cluster/projects/chanlab/mPDX_scite/input/D_combined_ngt.csv"
genenames="/cluster/projects/chanlab/mPDX_scite/input/D_combined.geneNames"

/cluster/projects/chanlab/mpdx_c/SCITE-master/scite \
        -i $input \
        -names $genenames \
        -n 8 -m 3758 -r 3 -l 1000000 -fd 0.004836997 -ad 0.13 0.13 -cc 1.299164e-05 \
        -a --max_treelist_size 1 \
        -seed 69 -o /cluster/projects/chanlab/mPDX_scite/output/scite.out_D_combined_20220501

```
